00391 inline bool 
00392 StreetSegmentItem::partOfStreet() const
00393 {
00394    bool retVal = false;
00395    uint32 myZoom = m_localID >> 27;
00396    for (uint32 i=0; i<getNbrGroups(); i++) {
00397       uint32 groupZoom = getGroup(i) >> 27;
00398       DEBUG4(cerr << "Item::partOfStreet() groupZoom = " 
00399                   << groupZoom << ", myZoom = " << myZoom << endl);
00400       if ( groupZoom < myZoom)
00401          retVal = true;
00402    }
00403    DEBUG4(
00404       if (retVal)
00405          cerr << "   Item::partOfStreet, returning TRUE" << endl;
00406       else
00407          cerr << "   Item::partOfStreet, returning FALSE" << endl;
00408    );
00409 
00410    return (retVal);
00411 }
